entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is leading the group and making decisions.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being part of the group with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being part of the group with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is mentioned as having told them about the Curse of the Bogies.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as being a potential threat and is expected to arrive soon.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as being with Malfoy and is also expected to arrive soon.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as a potential threat that Harry expects to run into.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs Norris is mentioned as being with Filch and is also a potential threat.

entities.name: bogies
entities.description: The Curse of the Bogies is mentioned as something that Quirrell told them about and they are trying to learn how to use it.

entities.name: midnight duel
entities.description: The Midnight Duel is mentioned as the event they are sneaking around for.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends and are working together to sneak into the trophy room.
Harry and Hermione are friends and are also part of the group sneaking into the trophy room.
Quirrell has knowledge about the Curse of the Bogies, which he told Harry and his friends about.
Harry is expecting Malfoy to arrive soon and cause trouble.
Harry is also expecting Crabbe to arrive soon and cause trouble, as he is with Malfoy.
